name: Barbados Rum Punch

ingredients.item: Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)
Aged Barbados rum (such as Mount Gay)

preparation:
An island paradise right in your glass.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.

Garnish with a pinch of freshly grated nutmeg and a lime wheel.
